Merge pull request #284 from asaf400/master

Fix: VLC Playback Blank Entry

Fix: VLC Playback Blank Entry

Fixed: VLC Playlist has a Blank Entry, which vlc interpreters as 'play working directory',
This causes vlc to attempt and playback every single file (.dll \ .exe, etc..), The final result is a playlist complete of weird annoying sounds.

Merge pull request #141 from Sheraff/master

added events onDownload & onListening to get the ball rolling on plugin stuff

added events onDownload & onListening

just getting the ball rolling

Draw more often

Makes the pausing and resuming a lot smoother.
Subtract paused time from elapsed time

Implement pause/resume for downloads

This commit makes it possible to pause an active download by hitting the
spacebar. This just deselects all the currently active files.

Require "keypress"

"keypress" makes it possible to react directly on keypress events in the
CLI which we want to use for the pause/resume functionality.

Merge pull request #63 from ivantodorovich/master

Move things from app.js to index.js

- Moved a few things from the app into the peerfix module:
  - `engine.on('uninterested')` behaviour
  - `server.listen` when engine is ready.

Also..

- `app.js`: Removed unnecessary `require('fs')`
- `index.js`: Commented a few lines.
- `index.js`: Renamed `engine` to `torrentStream` and `e` to `engine` for the sake of clarity.

Merge pull request #11 from Ivshti/master

Code infrastructure improvements

Separated the storage handling to storage.js, leaving server.js to handle only the server, added the ability to resume torrent downloads, also to disable DHT completely (e.g. running only on fastpeers)
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/Ivshti/peerflix into Ivshti-master
Implemented a fastpeers option allowing to pass a list of peers to first connect to (e.g. testing purposes)
Server now emitting 'finished' signal if the entire download is complete.
Use full parameter names when reading from .options
Export torrent as a property to the peerflix object. Also, minor tweaks
added mplayer option. not prefetching end when playing avi. removed shorthand for path
Separated the business logic from the command line program. Now peerflix can be used as a standalone Node.js module.

Merge pull request #9 from Ivshti/patch-6

Fixed --index parameter

Fixed --index parameter

The previous check depended on the parameter being truthy, which isn't the case if the index is 0. So "--index 0" did not work and selected the biggest file instead.

Merge pull request #8 from Ivshti/patch-5

Fixed conflicting argument - b as a buffer size

Fixed conflicting argument - b as a buffer size

argv.b was interpreted as an option to change the name of the buffer file, but it was also used for the buffer size. Therefore, the buffer file name by default was "1.5MB". Anyway, I added an option "bp"/"path" (is that the best name for it?) that adds the ability to change buffer file path altogether (and not only the name), which is more useful.
supporting forceing a block select to better support end-game
added audio jack option for omx
last piece is prefetched for lower start time

Merge pull request #6 from skeggse/patch-1

Update server.js

Merge pull request #7 from Ivshti/patch-4

Fixed progress property

Fixed progress property

Obtaining firstBlank using Math.min on two indexOf's was a flawed idea, since it disregarded the possibility of one of these being -1. In this case, for example, if there are no reserved pieces but the buffer is all blank ones, it would regard the piece as fully downloaded.
fixed liveness bug when fetching last pieces

Update server.js

Use node's util.inherits for prototypal inheritance
using speedometer and some small refactors
